--- title: Bandung House Pricing author: Windaru date: '2023-04-16' categories: - code --- Photo by Neermana Studio on Unsplash ![](neermana-studio-SYKYxuT2o5w-unsplash (1).jpg) ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd from sklearn.datasets import make_regression from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import seaborn as sns from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} pd.set_option('display.max_colwidth', 255) ``` ::: # BACKGROUND Machine learning project ini digunakan untuk memprediksi harga rumah yang dijual di kota bandung dan sekitarnya, data yang digunakan di scrape dari web OLX indonesia, project ini bertujuan untuk memperkirakan harga rumah yang dijual berdasarkan beberapa kriteria yang dimasukkan oleh penjual rumah di web OLX ## Who is this for? Warga atau agen perumahan yang memerlukan referensi untuk menentukan harga rumah yang akan dijual # Dataset Dataset yang digunakan adalah hasil scrape menggunakan selenium + python, script python untuk scraping dapat ditemukan disini : https://github.com/maswin312/selenium_srape_olx/blob/main/Scraping%20OLX.ipynb Hasil scrape disimpan di drive untuk memudahkan proses # Data Cleaning ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} bandung = pd.read_csv('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vTAR6OtAl_QcmB5_YkJ6M_YTifhCd5Z1gJtoXFJoaPJWcL5fh5n2DnHRIanJBMOOLF5WRjprZXQP-c7/pub?gid=853666521&single=true&output=csv') bandung ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=84} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt for column in bandung.select_dtypes(exclude=['object']): plt.figure(figsize=(17,1)) sns.boxplot(data=bandung, x=column) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-1.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-2.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-3.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-4.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-5.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-6.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: Data harga memiliki beberapa outlier, berupa harga rumah yang terlalu tinggi, atau luas tanah yang lerlalu luas, kita akan singkirkan data - data tersebut, selanjutnya kita akan mengecek jumlah data yang kita miliki per kecamatan ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} bandung.groupby(["Kecamatan"])["price"].agg("count").reset_index().sort_values( "price", ascending=False, ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=86} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: Beberapa daerah hanya memiliki beberapa listing/data, karena terlalu sedikit, kita hanya akan gunakan daerah yang memiliki listing/data lebih dari 10 listing/data ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} #remove floor = 0, land and price too big bandung_clean = bandung[bandung['floor'] > 0] bandung_clean = bandung_clean[bandung_clean['sqr_land'] < 10000 ] bandung_clean = bandung_clean[bandung_clean['price'] < 3000000000 ] bandung_clean['price'] = bandung_clean['price']/1000000 bandung_clean.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=87} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} for column in bandung_clean.select_dtypes(exclude=['object']): plt.figure(figsize=(17,1)) sns.boxplot(data=bandung_clean, x=column) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-2.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-3.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-4.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-5.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-6.png){width=1289 height=134} ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} #remove kecamatan with listing < 10 bandung_clean_agg = bandung_clean.groupby(["Kecamatan"])["price"].agg("count").reset_index().sort_values( "price", ascending=False, ) kecamatans = bandung_clean_agg[bandung_clean_agg['price']>= 10]['Kecamatan'] bandung_clean_kec = bandung_clean[bandung_clean['Kecamatan'].isin(kecamatans)] bandung_clean_kec.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=89} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.figure(figsize=(15, 8)) sns.boxplot( data=bandung_clean_kec, x="price", y="Kecamatan", ) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-1.png){width=1316 height=651} ::: ::: Persebaran harga ditiap tiap kecamata, kecamatan buahbatu memiliki outlier yang paling bangyak dibandingkan dengan kecamatan lain, namun karena kecamatan tersebut memiliki data yang paling besar, maka kita akan tetap gunakan kecamatan tersebut ::: {.cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} bandung_clean_kec = bandung_clean_kec.drop(["link", "facility", 'Kabupaten', 'Provinsi'], axis=1) ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.figure(figsize= (15, 8)) sns.heatmap(bandung_clean_kec.corr(numeric_only= True), annot= True) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-13-output-1.png){width=1050 height=638} ::: ::: Menggunakan heatmap untuk melihat korelasi antar column, dapat dilihat luas bangunan memiliki korelasi yang paling kuat dengan harga, dan jumlah kamar memiliki korelasi yang paling rendah ::: {.cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} #ubah kecamatan menjadi kategori for col in ['certificate', 'Kecamatan']: bandung_clean_kec[col] = bandung_clean_kec[col].astype('category') ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} bandung_clean_kec.dtypes ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=95} ``` price float64 sqr_building int64 sqr_land int64 bedroom int64 bathroom int64 floor float64 certificate category Kecamatan category dtype: object ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=15} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.pairplot( bandung_clean_kec, ) # to show plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-16-output-1.png){width=1418 height=1417} ::: ::: Melihat hasil pairplot pada price dan luas bangunan dan luas tanah. model regressi mungkin bisa kita gunakan ::: {.cell execution_count=16} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.figure(figsize=(15, 8)) sns.boxplot( data=bandung_clean_kec, x="price", y="certificate", ) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-17-output-1.png){width=1361 height=651} ::: ::: mayoritas rumah yang dijual memiliki sertifikat SHM # Modeling ::: {.cell execution_count=17} ``` {.python .cell-code} #split data train - test def split_input_output(data, target_column): X = data.drop(columns = [target_column]) y = data[target_column] return X, y X, y = split_input_output(data = bandung_clean_kec, target_column = "price") ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=18} ``` {.python .cell-code} X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size = 0.2, random_state = 123) ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=19} ``` {.python .cell-code} X_train_clean = ( pd.get_dummies(X_train, prefix="") .reset_index() .drop( ["index"], axis=1, ) ) X_train_clean ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=100} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=20} ``` {.python .cell-code} from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingRegressor from sklearn.model_selection import GridSearchCV from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score, mean_absolute_error params = {'n_estimators': [100, 200, 300, 400, 500], 'learning_rate': [0.1, 0.05, 0.01]} # Buat gridsearch grad_tree = GradientBoostingRegressor(random_state = 123) grad_tree_cv = GridSearchCV(estimator = grad_tree, param_grid = params, cv = 5, scoring = "neg_mean_absolute_error") # Fit grid search cv grad_tree_cv.fit(X_train_clean, y_train) # Best params grad_tree_cv.best_params_ ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=101} ``` {'learning_rate': 0.05, 'n_estimators': 200} ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=21} ``` {.python .cell-code} grad_tree = GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators = 200, learning_rate=0.1, random_state = 123) grad_tree.fit(X_train_clean, y_train) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=102} ```{=html} 
GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators=200, random_state=123)

GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators=200, random_state=123)
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=22} ``` {.python .cell-code} y_pred_train_gbcv = grad_tree.predict(X_train_clean) # Calculate mean absolute error mae_gb_cv = mean_absolute_error(y_train, y_pred_train_gbcv) # Calculate R-squared r2_gb_cv = r2_score(y_train, y_pred_train_gbcv) ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=23} ``` {.python .cell-code} print(f'Score : {r2_gb_cv} \n Mae : {mae_gb_cv}') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Score : 0.9881089521455664 Mae : 56.51410615809776 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=24} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x=y_train, y=y_pred_train_gbcv) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-25-output-1.png){width=583 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=25} ``` {.python .cell-code} X_test_clean = ( pd.get_dummies(X_test, prefix="") .reset_index() .drop( ["index"], axis=1, ) ) X_test_clean.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=106} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=26} ``` {.python .cell-code} y_pred_test_gbcv = grad_tree.predict(X_test_clean) # Calculate mean absolute error test_mae_gb_cv = mean_absolute_error(y_test, y_pred_test_gbcv) # Calculate R-squared test_r2_gb_cv = r2_score(y_test, y_pred_test_gbcv) print(f'Score : {test_r2_gb_cv} \n Mae : {test_mae_gb_cv}') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Score : 0.7066844439835633 Mae : 228.86587835362891 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=27} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x=y_test, y=y_pred_test_gbcv) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](bandung_house_pricing_files/figure-html/cell-28-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: :::
